sweetalert.name: Sweet Alert
sweetalert.description: A beautiful and customizable replacement for javascript's popup boxes.

onclose0.description: Callback to execute when the alert was closed.

oncancel1.description: Callback to execute when the cancel alert button is clicked.

tag0.name: Tag
tag0.desc: A tag, which can be anything you like, to distinguish between different alert requests.

onconfirm2.description: Callback to execute when the confirm alert button is clicked.

onopen5.description: Callback to execute when the alert was opened.

ınvert_buttons_positions15.name: Invert buttons positions
ınvert_buttons_positions15.desc: Set to true if you want to invert default buttons positions (confirm-button on the left side).

position0.name: Position
position0.desc: top | top-left | top-right | center | center-left | center-right | bottom | bottom-left | bottom-right

width0.name: Width
width0.desc: Set width size by CSS. (px or %)

button_cancel11.desc: Enter the html code on the 'Cancel' button. Leave it blank if do not want to cancel button.

allow_cancel_with_escape_key14.desc: If set to false, the user can't dismiss the modal by pressing the escape key.

allow_cancel_with_outside_click17.desc: If set to false, the user can't dismiss the modal by clicking outside it.
